action.action-desc: Mr. Heck of Nevada (for himself, Mr. Ryan of Ohio, Mr. Cramer, Mrs. Capito, Ms. Brownley of California, Mrs. Kirkpatrick, Mr. Renacci, Mr. Barber, Mr. Meehan, Mr. Kilmer, Mr. Gardner, and Mr. Carney) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To exclude from consideration as income under the United States Housing Act of 1937 payments of pension made under section 1521 of title 38, United States Code, to veterans who are in need of regular aid and attendance.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Vulnerable Veterans Housing Reform Act of 2013.
Paragraph (4) of section 3(b) of the United States Housing Act of 1937 (42 U.S.C. 1437a(b)(4)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by inserting after prospective monthly amounts the following: , and any expenses related to aid and attendance as detailed under section 1521 of title 38, United States Code.
